titleStmt.title: Madagascar with other poems. By W. Davenant.
titleStmt.author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Thomas Walkly, and are to be sold at his shop at the Flying Horse neare Yorke house,

notesStmt.note: The first two leaves and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at the Flying Horse neare Yorke house
